scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT PC.Name Categoria, P.Name Producto, OD.UnitPrice, OD.UnitPriceDiscount
FROM [SalesLT].[ProductCategory] AS PC
     INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[Product] AS P ON P.ProductCategoryID=PC.ProductCategoryID
     INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] AS OD ON OD.ProductID=P.ProductID',

query: 'SELECT PC.ProductCategoryID CategoriaID, PC.Name Categoria, P.Name Producto, OD.UnitPrice, 100 Cantidad,
     (OD.UnitPrice*100) Total
FROM [SalesLT].[ProductCategory] AS PC
     INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[Product] AS P ON P.ProductCategoryID=PC.ProductCategoryID
     INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] AS OD ON OD.ProductID=P.ProductID',

FROM [SalesLT].[ProductCategory] AS PC

     INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] AS OD ON OD.ProductID=P.ProductID',
